channel.title: Unbelieveable
channel.description:
This is unreal. Starts as a normal school day, next thing you know. They talk to me about someone getting stabbed. Here's how it went. Principle:
Mike, someone said you have stabbed them in the arm. Is this true?
Me:
No..
Princible:
Well the nurse[Crybabylul] said she pulled out Graphite from his arm, from a pencil stab
Me:
Well I don't care what she found, it doesn't mean I did it?
Princible:
Well there was a point found in his arm, so someone did, and you said you poked him
The pencil I poked him with, was no sharp, no point [AT ALL] and I poked him on his hand. So today [Friday], the police called, saying what happend. So they're making me do community service or pay a 600$ fine. I think it's unfair because the other had no witnesses... Eh? -M,i,k,e

item.title: Unbelieveable
item.dc:creator: @M_i_K_e M,i,K,e
item.description:
@M_i_K_e wrote:

I don’t know how many people here are into Oldies, but theres a song. ‘I fought the law’, ‘I fought the law, and the law won’.
Eh, exactly the lesson, no point in fighting anymore.

Read full topic

item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“M,i,K,e, post:49, topic:161637”][quote author=Cryme Time link=topic=219965.msg1916071#msg1916071 date=1196922915]

So today [Friday], the police called, saying what happend.

So they’re making me do community service or pay a 600$ fine.

-M,i,k,e

Thats bullshit… I’ve beat a kid with a book infront of a teacher and all i got was a warning…
[/quote]

Well a lot of schools are more[size=1pt]\less[/size] strict.[/quote]
More is MORE LIEK IT ive beat the shit out of some kids and got Detention max. But that’s American schools systems now. Nothing can be an accident or not be your fault. If The Kid Doesnt Like you then thats the problem.

item.title: Unbelieveable
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:39, topic:161637”][quote author=bakatool link=topic=219965.msg1913101#msg1913101 date=1196755883]
yah shit happens words speak louder than actions.

I was once a scapegoat in my junior high school years and got left back for this bullshit too.

It was a regular day than all of a sudden the teachers purse goes missing, i’m just as I remember copying notes… Than all of a sudden the teacher says AHHHHHHHHHHHH than starts yelling. Most of my classmates are all black… no white pplz here im the only white here. Teacher asks they class did anyone see my purse and everyone says OH oh he took it. At first it started with 2 people than the whole class was against me. I couldn’t handle it and started laughing uncontrollably teacher being black also comes up all in my face and tells me to give her purse back. I say what purse rofl and she calls the DEAN on me which just calls my parents etc… nothing bad. At the end of the year next thing I know my report card says

NR NR NR NR on all subjects like wTF? I been absent maybe 4 days max rofl and I did all my tests with a 70+ in all subjects.

I know I should of sued for discrimination but I was dumb so i let it slide.
[/quote]

That’s why I support racial segregation.[/quote]
that was a good one. My school is pretty much all white and AZN. like 20 mexicans and 5 black people. then lots of asian people and then more whites. So no problems there since almost all of the asian people are nerds

Read full topic
